wikipedia_page.main: James Martin Comrie Ritchie, FCMI, FRSA (29 May 1917 – 3 June 1993) was the chairman and chief executive of Bowater Paper Corporation from 1969 to 1972.  At the time Bowater's was the world's largest newsprint producer.

response: * James Martin Ritchie (1917–1993), chairman of Bowater's
